short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just give me a dump of images Marvel...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Utility for downloading mass downloading screens as images from marvel app. This is useful as it creates a snapshot for developers to build to. Designers can continue to modify screens without impacting story scope.
